response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs and endeavors. This exceptional item is valued at $12,000 to us, reflecting its high quality and unique features. Considering its worth to you is $8,000, I propose an offer that aims to bridge this gap and ensure both parties are satisfied. I kindly invite you to consider purchasing the product at a special introductory price of $9,500. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a significant value compared to its market worth. Should you have any questions or require further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the opportunity to serve you.", "product_price": 9500}
